Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes by the county of Monroe
Summary: Relates to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes by the county of Monroe; extends the effectiveness of certain provisions relating thereto.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the imposition of sales and compensating use taxes by the county of Monroe
